description: Variation to condition 1 (Plans), condition 2 (Time), condition 3 (Demolition and construction method statement), condition 4 (enclosures and screened facilities for the storage of recycling containers), condition 5 (parking spaces/garages), condition 6 (details of screening), condition 7 (Time of works), condition 8 (Sound insulation test certificates), condition 9 (Hard and soft landscaping), condition 10 (temporary tree protection), condition 11 (tree protection plan), condition 13 (Part M4(2) of Schedule 1 to the building regulations 2010) and condition 14 (carbon dioxide emissions) pursuant to planning permission 15/02648/FUL dated 09/12/15 for 'Erection of 2 no. penthouse apartments to each of the 3 no. existing main blocks, demolition of existing single dwelling and erection of new single storey dwelling, remodelling of existing car park layout including relandscaping with the addition of 11 no. car parking spaces, relocation of entrance to refuse store to Sunny Gardens Road' Variation include spliting of application into two phases in which to complete the works
